name: The 10th International Conference on Mechanical Engineering, Materials Science, and Civil Engineering
content: Conference Introduction The International Conference on Mechanical Engineering, Materials Science, and Civil Engineering (ICMEMSCE2023) is scheduled to be held in Sanya, China from December 28th to 29th, 2023\. This conference mainly focuses on the application of mechanical engineering and material science in civil engineering, aiming to provide an international cooperation and exchange platform for experts and scholars in the fields of mechanical engineering, material science, and civil engineering, share research results, explore existing problems and challenges, and explore cutting-edge technologies. Publication Papers submitted to ICMEMSCE2023 will be reviewed by technical committees of the conference. All accepted and registered papers will be published in proceedings. And the press will submit all papers to major databases such as EI Compendex , Scopus and Scholar… Conference Theme Topics of Interest for submission include, but are not limited to: T1: Mechanical Engineering T2: Materials Science T3: Civil Engineering More Topics: http://www.icmemsce.org/pages/cfp.html Submission Method: 1.Submit by Open conf: http://icmemsce.org/openconf/openconf.php 2\. Email submission: cfp@icmemsce.org Note: Please choose a way to submit, do not repeat the submission. Contacts us WeChat：13125407442 Web: http://www.icmemsce.org Email: cfp@icmemsce.org
